attributes.action: Increase funding in the mental health recovery plan - particularly for the young
attributes.additional_details: All individuals in the UK should have access to mental health support particularly young people as a possible prevention is better than a cure. Mental health workers and psychiatrists should be involved in the planning of support in government. The current support is not enough and difficult to access.
attributes.background:
Increase the funding to ensure all young people have access to mental health support.
Improve the current support by further funding to ensure all those with mental health issues have access to support.
Increase funding so further sufferers can have access to a psychiatrist.

rejection.details:
We currently have several petitions open on the topic of increasing funding and support of mental health services. You may like to sign some of the following:

Fund mental health units in all hospitals in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581452

Increase funding for mental health care for those at risk of homelessness
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581757

Increase funding for mental health support for all Emergency services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586670

Fund free anti-depressants through the NHS
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585911

Increase Support For Men's Mental Health
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590747

Provide dedicated funding for Mental Health day centres
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578776

Fund improved mental health support prior to release for female inmates
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581730

Increase funding for NHS mental health services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581222

Provide more funding to schools for mental health programmes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574673

Fund a 24-hour NHS mental health helpline and treatment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585974

Increase funding for Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575532
